div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1279 Meniko, near anc. Tamassus, 1952 Burial: c. 350 B.C. Contents: 394 AR. Pot hoard Amathus: 2 fr. Lapethus: 2 fr. Marium: 1 fr. Salamis: 36 fr. Unc. Cypriote mint: 353 fr. (as BMC Unc. F) Disposition: Nicosia Karageorghis, Opuscula Atheniensia 1965, pp. 9-36, illus.
